name: Deal With It! (Jousting Knight Games)
description:
Originally intended to be a submission for the Ludwig Jam, DEAL WITH IT! is a single deal version of Accordion Solitaire.

HOW TO PLAY

Click to select a card.  Click again to choose which card to move to.

The objective of DEAL WITH IT! is to reduce the board down to one card by moving cards from right to left, removing cards along the way.

You remove cards by covering them with another card of the same rank or suit.  You may only cover cards one position to the left or three positions to the left of the card you move.

For example, in the situation below, you can move the Jack of Hearts to the Jack of Clubs, or the Five of Hearts.
